text: Khalid bin Abdulaziz Al Saud ( ; 13 February 1913 â€“ 13 June 1982) was the King of Saudi Arabia from 1975 to 1982. He was the fourth ruler of the country. Khalid died of a heart attack in Ta'if, Saudi Arabia, aged 69. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Kings of Saudi Arabia
title: Khalid of Saudi Arabia
